## *Ad hoc* tools, notes and workbooks to better understand *Marketing Analytics*

-   Executive summaries of books by Byron Sharp and colleagues

-   Notes on application of the Negative Binomial and Dirichlet
    (*NBM-Dirichlet*) models

-   Excel workbooks for exploring and analysing purchase data, and
    applying *NBM-Dirichlet* models
